anya-e1102n3:1_0: Idāni “saddhammasavanampi cāti imassa saṁvaṇṇanākkamo sampatto tattha saddhammasavanampi ca loke dullabhameva tathā hi saddhammo nāma tividho hoti.
anya-e1102n3:1_5: Paṭipattisaddhammo nāma terasadhutaṅgāni asīti khandhakavattādayo abhisamācāravattādīni.
anya-e1102n3:1_7: Tesu pariyattisaddhammo dvinnaṁ saddhammānaṁ pubbaṅgamoyeva padaṭṭhānañca.
anya-e1102n3:1_8: Kasmā taṁmūlakattā tathā hi pariyattiyā asati paṭivedho nāma natthi.
anya-e1102n3:1_11: Kiṁ kāraṇā ayañhi pariyatti paṭipattiyā paccayo hoti.
anya-e1102n3:1_13: Tattha paṭivedho ca paṭipatti ca hotipi nahotipi.
anya-e1102n3:1_14: Ekasmiñhi kāle paṭivedhadharā bhikkhū bahū honti,
anya-e1102n3:1_15: “esa bhikkhu puthujjano”ti aṅguliṁ paharitvā dassetabbo hoti.
anya-e1102n3:1_16: Imasmiṁ yeva dīpe ekavāraṁ puthujjanabhikkhunāma nāhosi.
anya-e1102n3:1_17: Paṭipattipūrakāpi kadāci bahū honti kadāci appā.
anya-e1102n3:1_18: Iti paṭivedho ca paṭipatti ca hotipi na hotipi.
anya-e1102n3:1_19: Sāsanassa ṭhitiyā pana pariyattiyeva pamāṇaṁ paṇḍito hi tepiṭakaṁ sutvā dvepi pūreti,
anya-e1102n3:1_20: yathā amhākaṁ bodhisatto āḷārassa santike pañca abhiññā satta ca samāpattiyo nibbattetvā nevasaññānāsaññāyatana samāpattiyā parikammaṁ pucchi.
anya-e1102n3:1_22: Tato udakassa santikaṁ gantvā adhigatavisesaṁ saṁsanditvā nevasaññānāsaññāyatanassa parikammaṁ pucchi.
anya-e1102n3:1_24: tassa vacanasamanantarameva mahāsatto taṁ sampādesi evameva paññavā bhikkhu pariyattiṁ sutvā dvepi pūreti
anya-e1102n3:1_25: tasmā pariyattiyā ṭhitāya sāsanaṁ ṭhitaṁ hoti yathā mahātaḷākassa pāḷiyā thirāya udakaṁ na ṭhassatīti
anya-e1102n3:1_26: na vattabbaṁ udake sati padumādīni pupphāni na pupphissantīti na vattabbaṁ evameva mahātaḷākassa thirapāḷisadise
anya-e1102n3:1_27: tepiṭake buddhavacane sati mahātaḷāke udakasadisā paṭipattipūrakā kulaputtā natthīti na vattabbaṁ.
anya-e1102n3:1_28: Tesu sati mahātaḷākesu padumādīni pupphāni viya sotāpannādayo ariyapuggalā natthīti na vattabbaṁ,
anya-e1102n3:1_29: ekantato pariyattiyeva pamāṇaṁ pariyattiyā antarahitāya paṭipattipaṭivedhānaṁ antaradhānato.
anya-e1102n3:1_30: Tattha pariyattināma tepiṭakaṁ buddhavacanaṁ sāṭṭhakathā pāḷiyāva sā tiṭṭhati,
anya-e1102n3:1_32: Gacchante kāle kaliyugarājāno adhammikā honti tesu adhammikesu rājāmaccādayo adhammikā honti tathā raṭṭhajanapadavāsinopi
anya-e1102n3:1_33: adhammikā etesaṁ adhammikatāya na devo sammā vassati,
anya-e1102n3:1_35: Tesu sampajjantesu paccayadāyakā bhikkhusaṅghassa paccaye dātuṁ na sakkonti.
anya-e1102n3:1_36: Bhikkhū paccayehi kilamantā antevāsike saṅgahetuṁ na sakkonti.
anya-e1102n3:1_40: Tato kāle gacchante pāḷimpi sakalaṁ dhāretuṁ na sakkonti paṭhamaṁ abhidhammapiṭakaṁ parihāyati.
anya-e1102n3:1_41: Parihāyamānaṁ matthakato paṭṭhāya pariyatti hāyati paṭhamañhi mahāpakaraṇaṁ parihāyati.
anya-e1102n3:1_46: dhammasaṅgahoti evaṁ abhidhammapiṭake parihīne matthakato paṭṭhāya suttantapiṭakaṁ parihāyati.
anya-e1102n3:1_49: tato ekanipātoti evaṁ aṅguttare parihīne matthakato paṭṭhāya saṁyuttanikāyo parihāyati,
anya-e1102n3:1_54: sagāthāvaggoti evaṁ saṁyuttanikāye parihīne matthakato paṭṭhāya majjhimanikāyo parihāyati paṭhamañhi uparipaṇṇāsako parihāyati.
anya-e1102n3:1_56: tato mūlapaṇṇāsakoti evaṁ majjhimanikāye parihīne matthakato paṭṭhāya dīghanikāyo parihāyati,
anya-e1102n3:1_58: tato khandhakavaggoti dīghanikāye parihīne suttantapiṭakaṁ parihīnaṁ nāma hoti.
anya-e1102n3:1_61: Lābhakāmā pana suttante kathitepi sallakkhentā natthīti jātakameva dhārenti.
anya-e1102n3:1_62: Gacchante kāle jātakampi dhāretuṁ na sakkonti.
anya-e1102n3:1_67: Gacchante kāle tampi matthakato parihāyati paṭhamañhi parivāro parihāyati,
anya-e1102n3:1_68: tato khandhako bhikkhunīvibhaṅgo mahāvibhaṅgoti anukkamena uposathakkhandhakamattameva dhārenti,
anya-e1102n3:1_72: Yadā saddho pasanno rājā hatthikkhandhe suvaṇṇacaṅkoṭakamhi sahassatthavikaṁ ṭhapāpetvā “buddhehi kathitaṁ
anya-e1102n3:1_73: catuppadikaṁ gāthaṁ jānanto imaṁ sahassaṁ gaṇhatū”ti nagare bheriṁ carāpetvā gaṇhakaṁ alabhitvā ekavāraṁ
anya-e1102n3:1_75: yāva tatiyaṁ carāpetvā gaṇhakaṁ alabhitvā rājapurisā sahassatthavikaṁ puna rājakulaṁ pavesenti,
anya-e1102n3:1_77: Evaṁ pariyattiyā antarahitāya paṭipattipi paṭivedhopi antarahitova hoti.
anya-e1102n3:1_78: Saddhammasavanassa dullabhabhāvo dhammasoṇḍakavatthunā dīpetabbo amhākaṁ kira sammāsambuddho kassapasammāsambuddhassa
anya-e1102n3:1_79: dhammarājassa sāsanantaradhānato nacireneva kālena bārāṇasirañño putto dhammasoṇḍakarājakumāro hutvā
anya-e1102n3:1_80: pituaccayena rajje patiṭṭhāya kassapadasabalena desitaṁ dhammaṁ sotukāmo hutvā māsamattaṁ rajjaṁ katvā
anya-e1102n3:1_81: amhākaṁ sammāsambuddho imasmiṁ yeva bhaddakappe rajjaṁ kāretvā devanagarasadise bārāṇasinagare cakkavattirajjasadisaṁ
anya-e1102n3:1_83: “mayhaṁ evarūpaṁ rajjaṁ kiṁ vilāsaṁ rajjānubhāvaṁ saddhammaviyogena,
anya-e1102n3:1_89: catuakkharaniyamitadhammadesanāviyogena mayhaṁ idaṁ rajjaṁ na sobhatī”ti cintetvā suvaṇṇacaṅkoṭakena
anya-e1102n3:1_90: sahassatthavikaṁ bhaṇḍakaṁ susajjitaṁ maṅgalahatthikumbhe ṭhapetvā bārāṇasīnagare mahāvīthiyaṁ bheriṁ
anya-e1102n3:1_91: carāpeti “ekapadikaṁ vā dvipadikaṁ vā tipadikaṁ vā catuppadikaṁ vā dhammapadaṁ jānantassa dammī”ti evaṁ
anya-e1102n3:1_92: bheriṁ carāpetvā dhammajānanakaṁ alabhitvā punappunaṁ dvisahassaṁ tisahassaṁ yāva satasahassaṁ koṭi dve
anya-e1102n3:1_95: Pariyosāne dhammadesakaṁ alabhitvā attano suvaṇṇapīṭhakaṁ setacchattaṁ cajitvāpi dhammadesakaṁ alabhitvā
anya-e1102n3:1_96: rajjasiriṁ pahāya attānaṁ cajitvā “dhammadesakassa dāso hutvāpi dhammaṁ sossāmī”ti vatvā evampi dhamma
anya-e1102n3:1_97: desakaṁ alabhitvā vippaṭisārī hutvā “kiṁ me saddhammaviyogena rajjenāti amaccānaṁ rajjaṁ niyyātetvā saddhammagavesako
anya-e1102n3:1_98: hutvā dhammasoṇḍakamahārājā mahāvanaṁ pāvisi dhammasoṇḍakamahārājassa saddhammasavanaṁ sandhāya paviṭṭhakkhake
anya-e1102n3:1_99: sakkadevamahārājassa vejayantapāsādo saheva kiṇṇikāya kampo ahosi,
anya-e1102n3:1_101: Sakkodevarājā kenakāraṇena paṇḍukambalasilāsanaṁ uṇhākāraṁ ahosī”ti cintetvā attano sahassanettena devamanussesu
anya-e1102n3:1_102: vitthāretvā olokento dhammagavesako hutvā vanaṁ paviṭṭhaṁ dhammasoṇḍakamahārājānaṁ disvā cintesi…
anya-e1102n3:1_103: “ajja me attānampi jahāya rakkhasavesaṁ māpetvā etaṁ aniccaparidīpanaṁ jātijarābyādhimaraṇaṁ sakalasarīre
anya-e1102n3:1_104: dosaṁ dassetvā dhammaṁ desetvā etaṁ sakarajjeyeva patiṭṭhāpetabba”nti cintetvā sakko devarājā yakkhasarūpaṁ
anya-e1102n3:1_105: māpetvā bodhisattassa abhimukho avidūre attānaṁ dassesi.
anya-e1102n3:1_108: cintetvā avidūre ṭhāne ṭhatvā pucchāmīti rakkhasena saddhiṁ sallapanto āha “sāmipuññadevarāja imasmiṁ
anya-e1102n3:1_109: pana vanaghane vasanakadevarājā kiṁ nukho dhammaṁ jānāsī”ti,
anya-e1102n3:1_114: tvaṁ mayhaṁ kīdisaṁ dhammakathikassa sakkāraṁ karissasī”ti āha.
anya-e1102n3:1_115: “Evaṁ sante mayhaṁ dhammaṁ kathetvā pacchā mayhaṁ sarīre maṁsaṁ khādissasī”ti āha.
anya-e1102n3:1_116: “Ahaṁ mahārāja chāto hutvā dhammaṁ kathetuṁ na sakkomī”ti āha.
anya-e1102n3:1_119: Puna so rakkhaso “nāhaṁ dhammaṁ desetuṁ sakkomī”ti.
anya-e1102n3:1_120: Puna rājā “mayhaṁ dhammapaṭilābhañca tumhākaṁ maṁsapaṭilābhañca tumhe jānitvā mayhaṁ dhammaṁ desethā”ti āha.
anya-e1102n3:1_121: Atha sakko devarājā “sādhu hothā”ti vatvā avidūre ṭhāne ubbedhena tigāvutamattaṁ mahantaṁ añjanapabbataṁ māpetvā evamāha…
anya-e1102n3:1_122: “sace mahārāja imaṁ pabbatamuddhaniṁ ārūyha ākāsā uppatitvā tvaṁ mama mukhe patissasi,
anya-e1102n3:1_124: evaṁ sante tuyhañca dhammappalābho mayhañca maṁsapaṭilābho bhavissatī”ti āha.
anya-e1102n3:1_125: Tassa kathaṁ sutvā dhammasoṇḍakamahārājā “anamatagge saṁsāre puriso hutvā adhammasamaṅgī hutvā adhammasseva
anya-e1102n3:1_126: atthāya pāṇātipāto adinnādāno kāmesumicchācāro sūkariko orabbhiko sākuṇi ko coro paradāriko taṁ gahetvā
anya-e1102n3:1_127: sīsacchinnānaṁ lohitaṁ catūsu mahāsamuddesu udakatopi bahutaraṁ mātāpituādīnampi manāpānaṁ atthāya rodantānaṁ
anya-e1102n3:1_129: imaṁ pana sarīraṁ dhammassa atthāya vikkiṇāmi taṁ mahapphalañca manāpañcā”ti cintetvā “sādhu mārisa evaṁ
anya-e1102n3:1_130: karomī”ti pabbataṁ ārūyha pabbatagge ṭhito “mama rajjena saddhiṁ mayhaṁ sajīvasarīraṁ saddhammassatthāya
anya-e1102n3:1_131: dassāmī”ti somanasso hutvā “dhammaṁ kathethā”ti saddhammatthāya jīvitaṁ pariccajitvā ākāsato uppatitvā
anya-e1102n3:1_133: Atha sakko devarājā sakattabhāvena sabbālaṅkārehi paṭimaṇḍito ativiya sotuṁ somanasso ākāsato patantaṁ
anya-e1102n3:1_134: dibbaphassena parāmasanto urena paṭiggaṇhitvā devalokaṁ netvā paṇḍukambalasilāsane nisīdāpetvā mālāgandhādīhi
anya-e1102n3:1_135: pūjetvā dhammasoṇḍakamahārājassa dhammaṁ desento imaṁ gāthamāha.
anya-e1102n3:4_0: Evaṁ sakko dhammasoṇḍakamahārājassa dhammaṁ desetvā devalokasampattiṁ dassetvā devalokato ānetvā sakarajje
anya-e1102n3:4_1: patiṭṭhāpetvā appamādena ovaditvā devalokameva agamāsi evaṁ saddhammasavanassāpi dullabhabhāvo veditabbo.
anya-e1102n3:4_3: Ettha ca tīṇi parinibbānāni veditabbāni katamāni tīṇi parinibbānāni.
anya-e1102n3:4_8: bhagavā hi bodhimaṇḍeyeva vīriyapādehi sīlapathaviyaṁ patiṭṭhāya saddhāhatthena kammakkhayakaraṁ ñāṇapharasuṁ
anya-e1102n3:4_13: saṅkhepato vā pañca kilesaabhisaṅkhārakhandhamaccudevaputtamāre asesato hatā vihatā anabhāvaṁkatā tasmā
anya-e1102n3:4_14: sabbepi kilesā bodhimaṇḍeyeva nibbānaṁ nirodhaṁ gacchantīti kilesanibbānaṁ bodhimaṇḍeyeva hoti ettha
anya-e1102n3:4_15: ca bodhīti arahattamaggaññāṇaṁ adhippetaṁ tathā hi sabbesampi buddhapaccekabuddhaariyasāvakānaṁ arahattamaggakkhaṇeyeva
anya-e1102n3:4_16: sabbepi kilesā asesaṁ nirodhaṁ nibbānaṁ gacchanti tepi buddhā ugghaṭitaviññūvibhajjitaññūneyyavasena
anya-e1102n3:6_0: Tatiyo neyyo nāmena, bodhisatto tidhā mato.
anya-e1102n3:9_0: Mato neyyo saddhādhiko nāma, bodhisattā ime tayo;
anya-e1102n3:13_0: Aṭṭhame ca asaṅkhyeyye, kappe ca satasahasse;
anya-e1102n3:16_0: Neyyo tu bodhisatto ca, soḷase asaṅkhyeyye.
anya-e1102n3:19_0: Suttanipātaapadānaṭṭhakathāsu pana “buddhānaṁ ānanda heṭṭhimaparicchedena cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni kappasatasahassañca,
anya-e1102n3:19_3: Eteca paññādhikasaddhādhikavīriyādhikavasena veditabbāti vuttaṁ tesu paññādhiko cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni kappasatasahassañca,
anya-e1102n3:19_6: Tattha paññādhiko yonigativiññāṇaṭṭhitisattāvāsesu saṁsarantopi paññābahullavasena sampannajjhāsaya sambhavato khippaññeva tassa sambodhi.
anya-e1102n3:19_11: rājā passenadīkosalo yathā so hi sabbaññubuddhe dharamāneyeva agamanīyampi paradāraṁ gantuṁ cittaṁ uppādetvā
anya-e1102n3:19_12: paraṁ jīvitā voropetuṁ āraddho nerayikānaṁ viravantānaṁ du-sa-na-soti saddampi sutvā ativimūḷho sabbaññubuddhaṁ
anya-e1102n3:19_13: ṭhapetvā micchādiṭṭhibrāhmaṇaṁ pucchitvā tassa vacanena sabbajanānaṁ yaññatthāya dukkhaṁ uppādesi ko
anya-e1102n3:19_15: tathā hi esa kassapabhagavato sāsanantaradhānena andhabhūte loke bārāṇasiyaṁ rājā hutvāpi nigrodharukkhadevatāya
anya-e1102n3:19_16: yaññatthāya ekasatarājāno mahesīhi saddhiṁ māretuṁ āraddho.
anya-e1102n3:19_18: tasmā tassa sambodhi atimandoti evaṁ paññādhikasaddhādhikavīriyādhikavasena kālassāpi rassadīghabhāvo veditabboti.
anya-e1102n3:19_20: Khandhaparinibbānaṁ pana kusinārāya upavattane mallānaṁ sālavane yamakasālānamantare vesākhapuṇṇamadivase
anya-e1102n3:19_22: mahāvipākacittena abyākatena carimakaṁ katvā katthaci bhave paṭisandhiviññāṇassa anantarapaccayo hutvā
anya-e1102n3:19_23: kammataṇhākilesehi anupādāno sabbupadhipaṭinissaggo upādinnakakkhandhapariccāgo hotīti veditabbaṁ.
anya-e1102n3:19_24: Vitthāro pana dīghanikāye mahāvagge mahāparinibbānasuttavaṇṇanāyaṁ oloketabbo.
anya-e1102n3:19_25: Tattha videsaṁ gacchanto puriso sabbaṁ ñātijanaṁ āliṅgetvā sīse cumbitvā gacchati viya bhagavāpi nibbānapuraṁ
anya-e1102n3:19_26: pavisanto sabbepi catuvīsatikoṭisatasahassasamāpattiyo anavasesaṁ samāpajjitvā yāva saññāvedayitaṁ,
anya-e1102n3:19_27: tatopi vuṭṭhāya yāva nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṁ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya jhānaṅgāni paccavekkhitvā bhavaṅgacittena abyākatena dukkhasaccena parinibbāyi.
anya-e1102n3:19_28: Pāḷiyaṁ pana “catutthajjhānā vuṭṭhahitvā samanantarā bhagavā parinibbāyī”ti vuttaṁ tattha dve samanantarā jhānasamanantarā,
anya-e1102n3:19_30: Tattha jhānā vuṭṭhāya bhavaṅgaṁ otiṇṇassa tattheva parinibbānaṁ jhānasamanantaraṁ nāma.
anya-e1102n3:19_31: Jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā puna jhānaṅgāni paccavekkhitvā bhavaṅgaṁ otiṇṇassa tattheva parinibbānaṁ paccavekkhaṇasamanantaraṁ nāma.
anya-e1102n3:19_32: Bhagavā pana jhānasamanantarā apari nibbāyittā paccavekkhaṇasamanantarameva parinibbāyīti veditabbaṁ,
anya-e1102n3:19_33: tenevāha “bhagavā pana jhānaṁ samāpajjitvā jhānā vuṭṭhāya jhānaṅgāni paccavekkhitvā bhavaṅgacittena abyākatena dukkhasaccena parinibbāyī”ti.
anya-e1102n3:19_34: Ettha bhagavato parinibbānacittassa kiṁ ārammaṇaṁ kammaṁ vā hoti,
anya-e1102n3:24_0: Imissāgāthāya “yaṁ yo muni anejo santi nibbānaṁ ārabbha kālaṁ akarī”ti yojetvā bhagavato parinibbānacittassa nibbānārammaṇanti tamayuttaṁ,
anya-e1102n3:24_1: paṭisandhibhavaṅgacutīnaṁ nibbānārammaṇassa anārahattā “nibbānaṁ gotrabhussa vodānassa maggassa ārammaṇapaccayenapaccayo,
anya-e1102n3:24_2: nibbānaṁ phalassa āvajjanāyā”ti paṭṭhānapāḷiyā javanaāvajjanānameva adhippetattā tasmā ettha “yaṁ yo
anya-e1102n3:24_3: muni phalasamāpattiyā anejo anejasaṅkhāto taṇhārahito santiṁ nibbānaṁ ārabbha ārammaṇaṁ katvā kālaṁ asītivassaparimāṇaṁ
anya-e1102n3:24_6: “katthaci pana anuppajjamānassa khīṇāsavassa yathopaṭṭhitaṁ nāmarūpadhammādikameva cutipariyosānānaṁ gocarabhāvaṁ gacchati,
anya-e1102n3:24_7: na kamma-kammanimittādayo”ti vuttattā kammanittagatinimittāni arahato cuticittassa ārammaṇabhāvaṁ na
anya-e1102n3:24_8: gacchantīti tampi ayuttameva ayañhetthattho katthaci pana bhave anuppajjamānassa khīṇāsavassa arahato
anya-e1102n3:24_9: yathā yathā yena yena pakārena upaṭṭhitaṁ nāmarūpadhammādikameva cutipariyosānaṁ āvajjanajavanacittānaṁ
anya-e1102n3:24_12: Kiṁ kāraṇaṁ bhūtāni kammakammanimittagatinimittāni gocarabhāvaṁ na gacchantīti.
anya-e1102n3:24_13: Cuticittassa pana paṭisandhicittena gahitaṁ atītārammaṇameva gocarabhāvaṁ gacchati.
anya-e1102n3:24_14: “Nāmarūpādikamevā ti ettha nāma”nti cittacetasikanibbānaṁ rūpanti aṭṭhārasavidhaṁ rūpaṁ saṅgaṇhāti.
anya-e1102n3:24_16: Nāmarūpā ca te dhammā ceti tathā.
anya-e1102n3:24_17: Te ādi yesaṁ teti nāmarūpadhammādi tameva nāmarūpadhammādikaṁ.
anya-e1102n3:24_19: tena nibbānampi arahato maraṇāsannakāle kriyajavanassapi ārammaṇabhāvo bhaveyyāti amhākaṁ khanti vīmaṁsitvā pana gahetabbaṁ.
anya-e1102n3:24_20: Bhagavato nibbānacittassa pana tusitapurato cavitvā sirīmahāmāyāya kucchimhi vasitapaṭisandhicittena
anya-e1102n3:24_21: gahitārammaṇameva ārammaṇaṁ hotīti daṭṭhabbaṁ tañca kho gatinimittameva,
anya-e1102n3:24_23: Yuttitopi āgamatopi gatinimittameva yujjati tathā hi tusitapureyeva setaketudevaputto hutvā dibbagaṇanāya cattāri sahassāni,
anya-e1102n3:24_25: disvā suddhāvāse arahantabrahmunā dasahi cakkavāḷasahassehi āgamma devatāvisesehi ca.
anya-e1102n3:27_1: kulaṁ mātarameva cā”ti vuttāni pañca mahāvilokanāni viloketvā tusitapurato cavitvā āsāḷhīpuṇṇamāyaṁ uttarāsāḷhanakkhatteneva
anya-e1102n3:27_4: Tadārammaṇāsannavīthito pubbabhāge ālokitāni kāladīpadesakulamātaravasena imāni pañca paṭisandhicittassa
anya-e1102n3:27_5: gatinimittārammaṇabhāvena gocarabhāvaṁ gacchantīti amhākaṁ khanti tanninnatappoṇatappabbhāravasena bāhullappavattito
anya-e1102n3:27_6: teneva abhidhammatthasaṅgahādīsu abhidhammattha vibhāvaniyaṁ “maraṇakāle yathārahaṁ abhimukhībhūtaṁ bhavantare
anya-e1102n3:27_7: paṭisandhijanakaṁ kammaṁ vā taṁ kammakaraṇakāle rūpādikamupaladdhapubbamupakaraṇabhūtañca kammanimittaṁ
anya-e1102n3:27_8: vā anantaramuppajjamānabhave upalabhitabbaṁ upabhogabhūtaṁ gatinimittaṁ vā kammabalena channaṁ dvārānamaññatarasmiṁ
anya-e1102n3:27_10: tato paraṁ tameva tathopaṭṭhitamālambaṇaṁ ārabbha vipaccamānakakammānurūpaṁ parisuddhaṁ vā,
anya-e1102n3:27_11: upakkiliṭṭhaṁ vā upapajjitabbabhavānurūpaṁ tatthoṇataṁva cittasantānamabhiṇhaṁ pavattati bāhullena.
anya-e1102n3:27_12: Tameva vā pana janakabhūtaṁ kammaṁ abhinavakaraṇavasena dvārappattaṁ hoti.
anya-e1102n3:27_13: Paccāsannamaraṇassa pana tassa vīthicittāvasāne bhavaṅgakkhayevā cavanavasena paccuppannabhavapariyosānabhūtaṁ cuticittaṁ uppajjitvā nirujjhati.
anya-e1102n3:27_14: Tasmiṁ niruddhāvasāne tassānantarameva tathā gahitamālambaṇamārabbha savatthukamavatthukameva vā yathārahaṁ
anya-e1102n3:27_15: avijjānusayaparikkhittena taṇhānusayamūlakena saṅkhārena janiyamānaṁ sampayuttehi pariggayhamānaṁ sahajātānamadhiṭṭhānabhāvena
anya-e1102n3:27_16: pubbaṅgamabhūtaṁ bhavantarapaṭisandhānavasena paṭisandhisaṅkhātaṁ mānasamuppajjamānameva patiṭṭhāti bhavantare”ti vuttaṁ.
anya-e1102n3:27_17: Tattha “tatthoṇataṁva cittasantānamabhiṇhaṁ pavattati bāhullenā”ti iminā kammabalena upaṭṭhitaṁ gatinimittaṁ
anya-e1102n3:27_19: sattāhato uttaripi uppajjate vāti dasseti tathā hi parisuddhaṁ vā upakkiliṭṭhaṁ vā vipaccamānakakammānurūpaṁ gatinimittaṁ cirakālampi tiṭṭhati,
anya-e1102n3:27_20: ariyagālatissacoraghātakādayo viya tathā hi ariyagālatisso nāma upāsako sīhaḷadīpe attano bhariyāya sumanāya
anya-e1102n3:27_21: saddhiṁ yāvajīvaṁ dānādi puññakammāni katvā āyūhapariyosāne ariyagālatissassa maraṇamañce nipannassa
anya-e1102n3:27_22: chadevalokato rathaṁ ānetvā attano attano devalokaṁ vaṇṇesuṁ.
anya-e1102n3:27_23: Upāsako devatānaṁ kathaṁ sutvā tusitapurato āhaṭarathaṁ ṭhapetvā avasesarathe “gahetvā gacchathā”ti āha.
anya-e1102n3:27_24: Sumanā pana attano sāmikassa vacanaṁ sutvā “kiṁ tissa maraṇāsanne vilāpaṁ akāsī”ti āha.
anya-e1102n3:27_25: Tisso attano bhariyāya kathaṁ sutvā āha…
anya-e1102n3:27_27: devalokato devatā cha rathe ānesuṁ tāhi devatāhi saddhaṁ kathemī”ti.
anya-e1102n3:27_28: Taṁ napassāmi kuhi”nti vutte pupphadāmaṁ āharāpetvā ākāse khipāpesi.
anya-e1102n3:27_29: Sā taṁ pupphadāmaṁ rathasīse olambamānaṁ disvā gabbhaṁ pavisitvā sayane sayitvā nāsikavātaṁ sannirujjhitvā cavitvā pāturahosi.
anya-e1102n3:27_33: Ubhopi rathe ṭhatvā sabbe olokentānaṁyeva tusitapuraṁ agamaṁsu.
anya-e1102n3:27_34: Imasmiñhi vatthusmiṁ sāmikassa upaṭṭhitagatinimittaṁ bhariyāya pākaṭaṁ hutvā puretaratusitapure nibbattitvā
anya-e1102n3:27_35: sāmikassa sāsanaṁ pesesi tena ariyagālatissassa cirakālaṁ gatinimittaṁ upaṭṭhātīti veditabbaṁ.
anya-e1102n3:27_36: Manussaloke hi cirakālaṁ tusitapure muhuttaṁva hoti.
anya-e1102n3:27_37: Evaṁ parisuddhaṁ vipaccamānakakammānurūpaṁ gatinimittaṁ cirakālaṁ pavattati iminā nayena duṭṭhagāmaṇiabhayadhammikaupsakādīnampi
anya-e1102n3:27_39: Coraghātakassa pana mahāniraye vipaccamānakakammānurūpaṁ nerayaggijālādikaṁ sattāhaṁ upaṭṭhāti.
anya-e1102n3:27_40: Sāvatthinagare kira pañcasatā corā bahinagare corakammaṁ karonti.
anya-e1102n3:27_41: Athekadivasaṁ janapadapuriso tesaṁ abbhantaro hutvā corakammaṁ akāsi,
anya-e1102n3:27_43: Rājā te disvā “tumhākaṁ antare ime sabbe māretuṁ samatthassa jīvitaṁ dammī”ti āha.
anya-e1102n3:27_44: Pañcasatā corā aññamaññaṁ sambandhā aññamaññaṁ sahāyakāti aññamaññaṁ māretuṁ na icchiṁsu,
anya-e1102n3:27_45: janapadamanusso pana “ahaṁ māremī”ti vatvā sabbe māresi.
anya-e1102n3:27_48: Rājā tassa mahallakoti vatvā aññassa coraghātaka kammaṁ dāpesi.
anya-e1102n3:27_49: So coraghātakakammā apanīto aññatarassa santike nāsikavātaṁ uggaṇhitvā hatthapādakaṇṇanāsādīhi chinditabbānaṁ
anya-e1102n3:27_50: ūrūthanakaṭṭhānaṁ bhindantamāretabbayuttānaṁ nāsikavātaṁ vissajjetvā māretabbaṁ mantaṁ labhi.
anya-e1102n3:27_51: So rājānaṁ ārocetvā nāsikavātena coraghātakakammaṁ karontasseva tiṁsa vassāni atikkami.
anya-e1102n3:27_52: So pacchā mahallako hutvā maraṇamañce nipajji “sattadivasena kālaṁ karissatī”ti.
anya-e1102n3:27_54: So mahāniraye nibbatto viya mahāsaddaṁ katvā dukkhito hoti.
anya-e1102n3:27_55: Tassa saddena bhītā manussā ubhatopasse gehaṁ chaḍḍetvā palāyiṁsu.
anya-e1102n3:27_56: Tassa maraṇadivase sāriputtatthero dibbacakkhunā lokaṁ olokento etassa kālaṁ katvā mahāniraye nibbattamānaṁ
anya-e1102n3:27_57: disvā tassa anukampaṁ paṭicca gehadvāre pākaṭo ahosi.
anya-e1102n3:27_59: Yāva tatiyaṁ vissajjamānopi vissajjāpetuṁ asakkonto theraṁ atirekena virocamānaṁ disvā cittaṁ pasādetvā pāyāsaṁ therassa dāpesi.
anya-e1102n3:27_61: Coraghātako therassa dinnadānaṁ anussaritvā cavitvā sagge nibbatti,
anya-e1102n3:27_64: Evaṁ upakkiliṭṭhaṁ vā vipaccamāna kakammānurūpaṁ gatinimittampi sattāhaparamaṁ upaṭṭhāti.
anya-e1102n3:27_66: Bhagavato pana parisuddhaṁ mettāpubbabhāgassa somanassa ñāṇasampayuttakusalassa kammassa vegena kāladīpadesakulamātaravasena
anya-e1102n3:27_70: tathāpi manussaloke sattāhamatte kāle devatānaṁ pañcapubbanimittāni paññāyanti tañca kho puññavantānaṁyeva paññāyanti,
anya-e1102n3:27_71: na sabbesaṁ manussaloke puññavantānaṁ rājarājamahāmattādīnaṁ viya taṁ disvā mahesakkhā devatā jānanti,
anya-e1102n3:27_74: Mahesakkhā devatā taṁ pubbanimittaṁ disvā nandavanaṁ netvā “kālo devā”ti ādīhi yācanti.
anya-e1102n3:27_75: Mahāsakko tattheva nandavanuyyāne kāladīpadesakulamātaravasena pañca viloketvā cavitvā tamārammaṇaṁ katvā
anya-e1102n3:28_0: Tattha kālanti manussaloke ekūnatiṁsatime vasse vesākhapuṇṇamadivase buddho bhavissāmīti kālaṁ olokesi.
anya-e1102n3:28_7: Tattha yasmiṁ kāle khattiyakulaṁ loke seṭṭhabhāvena “ayameva loke aggo”ti sammannati,
anya-e1102n3:28_9: Yasmiṁ pana kāle brāhmaṇakulaṁ ayameva loke aggoti,
anya-e1102n3:28_13: asambhinnakhattiyakulattā tasmā sakyarājakuleyeva bhavissāmīti kulaṁ olokesi.
anya-e1102n3:28_14: Mātaranti mama mātaraṁ dasa māsāni satta ca divasāni ṭhassati,
anya-e1102n3:28_15: etthantare mama mātuyā arogo bhavissatīti mātarampi olokesi.
anya-e1102n3:28_17: Evaṁ yuttitopi āgamatopi bhagavato nibbānacittassa paṭasandhicittena gahitanimittameva ārammaṇaṁ hotīti veditabbaṁ.
anya-e1102n3:31_0: Dhātuparinibbānampi bodhimaṇḍeyeva bhavissati vuttañhetaṁ uparipaṇṇāsake “dhātuparinibbānaṁ anāgate bhavissati
anya-e1102n3:31_1: sāsanassa hi osakkanakāle imasmiṁ tambapaṇṇidīpe dhātuyo sannipatitvā mahācetiyato nāgadīpe rājāyatanacetiyaṁ,
anya-e1102n3:31_3: Nāgabhavanatopi devalokatopi dhātuyo mahābodhipallaṅkameva gamissanti sāsapamattāpi dhātuyo antarā na nassissanti,
anya-e1102n3:31_4: sabbā dhātuyo mahābodhipallaṅke rāsibhūtā suvaṇṇakkhandhā viya ekagghanā hutvā chabbaṇṇarasmiyo vissajjissanti,
anya-e1102n3:31_6: Tato dasasahassacakkavāḷesu devatā sannipatitvā ''ajja satthā parinibbāyati ajja sāsanaṁ osakkati pacchimadassanaṁ
anya-e1102n3:31_7: idaṁ amhāka”nti dasabalassa parinibbutadivasato mahantataraṁ kāruññaṁ karissanti ṭhapetvā anāgāmikhīṇāsave
anya-e1102n3:31_9: dhātusarīrato tejodhātu uṭṭhahitvā yāva brahmalokā uggacchissati.
anya-e1102n3:31_10: Sāsapamattāyapi dhātuyā sati ekajālā bhavissati dhātūsu pariyādānaṁ gatāsu pacchijjissati.
anya-e1102n3:31_11: Evaṁ mahantaṁ ānubhāvaṁ dassetvā dhātūsu antarahitāsu sāsanaṁ antarahitaṁ nāma hoti.
anya-e1102n3:31_14: Parinibbānakālato paṭṭhāya yāva sāsapamattā dhātu tiṭṭhati,
anya-e1102n3:31_15: tāva buddhakālato pacchāti na veditabbaṁ dhātūsu hi ṭhitāsu buddhā ṭhitā va honti,
anya-e1102n3:31_16: tasmā etthantare aññassa buddhassa uppatti nivāritāva hoti.
anya-e1102n3:35_0: Yo karoti samaṁ pūjaṁ, phalaṁ tāsa samaṁ siyā’ti.
